::Shadow Wing::

She slept while in the chamber.  she dreamed of soaring high in the 
clouds and feeling the wind under her wings.  She looked down on the 
mountains and valleys as she flew past them.  She found herself 
flying over the old Ark.  She loked down and saw a battle taking 
place.  She saw Ares ramming Lunarpine.  She screamed, "NOOO!"  

She woke up to hear her own echo running throuhg the chamber.  Her 
wounds were healing.  She remembered the battle.  She remembered 
getting from behind and falling to the ground.  

"So how did I get here?"  She understood that someone had to have 
placed her in the chamber.  She wanted to get back out there and see 
if Lunarpine was ok.  But she had to wait until the damage was 
repaired.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Smokescreen::
> 
> Smokescreen runs into the Ark, dragging Shadow Wing behind him. He 
shoves her 
> quickly into a CR chamber, running back out to fire at Serpentor.
